alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:18PM CDT until June 13 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL KIMBLE...SOUTHEASTERN MENARD AND WESTERN MASON COUNTIES... At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Erna, or over Long Mountain, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Streeter around 825 PM CDT. Grit and Camp Air around 830 PM CDT. Mason and Katemcy around 835 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Highway 29 And Ranch Road 1222, Erna, Us- 377 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line and Koockville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
